Name: B.D.K
About the game: B.D.K is a short experimental first person horror game that mainly relies on atmosphere, sounds and one or two jump scares to create an eerie and creepy experience, the main part of the game takes you across multiple familiar horror tropes(forest, graveyard) while the other part of the game follows a more simpler path akin to a walking simulator. Features: The game is short. First person horror / thriller with a little bit of action. The story is non-liner. Best played with headphones.

Meta Description: Looking for information on B.D.K? Check out the release date (Nov 13, 2020), developer insights from EDO, and a complete game summary.
